name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Blastoise
description: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: Gengar
description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

name: Gardevoir
description: It unleashes psychokinetic energy at full power when protecting a Trainer it has bonded closely with.

name: Garchomp
description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Sylveon
description: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.

name: Greninja
description: It unleashes psychokinetic energy at full power when protecting a Trainer it has bonded closely with.

name: Pikachu
description: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

name: Mimikyu
description: Sad that its true identity may be exposed, Mimikyu will mercilessly seek revenge on any opponent that breaks its neck.

name: Lucario
description: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

name: Dragapult
description: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.

name: Toxtricity
description: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.
